item.title: Spurned lover slits college womanâ€™s throat after rejection in Karnataka
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur, Karnataka: In a shocking incident, a spurned lover here, brutally killed a college student in broad daylight by slitting her throat after she refused to marry him. The accused has surrendered to the police after committing the crime.
To advertise here, Contact Us
The deceased student has been identified as Shifa (24), while the accused is Mubin, a worker at a tile shop. The incident took place within the jurisdiction of the Sindhanoor Town police station.
